wikipedia_page.main: Keith England (born (1964-02-27)27 February 1964), also known by the nickname of "Beefy", is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Castleford (Heritage № 621), as a prop, or second-row, i.e. number 8 or 10, or, 11 or 12.
